results.content: I was up and runnung, using bootstrap for my pages in no time at all. Excellent starting point.
results.content_html: I was up and runnung, using bootstrap for my pages in no time at all. Excellent starting point.

results.content: No more than 10% of the content of this course is related to how Bootstrap can make coding for different devices easier. The teacher shows just a few responsive features of bootstrap (in particular, how the grid is rendered on one column on a small device) but says nothing about how the developer can intervene to make the mobile experience better. A lot of time is instead spent to show how to round buttons and stuff old school.
results.content_html: No more than 10% of the content of this course is related to how Bootstrap can make coding for different devices easier. The teacher shows just a few responsive features of bootstrap (in particular, how the grid is rendered on one column on a small device) but says nothing about how the developer can intervene to make the mobile experience better. A lot of time is instead spent to show how to round buttons and stuff old school.

results.content: The content is excellent, the product is excellent and the tutor is absolutely spot on (excellent!) I have many courses around this subject and I have some taught by great tutors and some by bad ones (I'll comment on him soon) but this guy is by far my favourite one.
